entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: I’m proud of Prime Minister @JustinTrudeau. He has had one heck of a start of the year. First, we had the Ukrainian Airline disaster. Then, we had the blockade. And now we have a COVID-19 global pandemic that is stressing our public health and our economy....... https://t.co/dn1lHFn13f
